overview:
Jon is the CEO and co-founder of 140 Proof, the leading social advertising company. Along with his co-founder, Jon developed the patented Proof Interest Graph content matching technology to harness the data of the social stream to more accurately deliver interesting content to customers.

Jon is proven leader in the technology space with experience in start-up, turnaround and growth stage companies. Before founding 140 Proof, Jon held senior executive engineering, marketing and sales positions at some of the world’s leading technology companies such as Hewlett-Packard, Microsoft and TIBCO, as well as internet success stories like LinkExchange. Jon has an engineering degree, with honors, from the University of Michigan and an MBA from Harvard University.
